name: Fruitaloo
description:
In this game you are a fruit(you can choose between 4 fruits to play),

You are trying to run from the spikes that if you touch them you get smash, but the Platforms and the enemies are Interfering you.

Your goal is to survive for the longest distance with the most amount of coins.

made by:

Yair Mizrachi - Coding: https://yair-mizrachi.itch.io/

José Granado - Graphics: https://lumagalaxy.itch.io/

capacraft - music:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCVPiuV-NhGqW9nMCJ4vdHg

The game took a while to make so please check it and give feedback.

Have fun!
